channel.title: Data Governance on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Data Governance on Ex Machina

item.title: Algorithmic Oversight
item.description: It is next to impossible to avoid the increasing personalisation of the internet. As more and more businesses look to understand their client better by personalising their services to them lawmakers have begun to look into the consequences of these actions. Could we develop software solutions for regulatory oversight so that we fight fire with fire?

item.title: Data is a Capital Asset
item.description: The insights we derive from data could help with governance in new and interesting ways. While they are already being used to predict crime what if instead of forcing companies and businesses to report their compliance, governments use data insights to predict it.
